attributes.action: Hold a public Referendum to exit ECHR and deport illegal immigrants immediately.
attributes.additional_details:
Because successive Governments have done VERY little to ease the usurious ever increasing burden on the taxpayer by their partisan politics, infighting and "point scoring" and just offering platitudes and excuses to the public for their "great efforts" at countering this ever increasing problem.

The burden on the Nations finances and Taxpayer has reached, in our opinion, an absolutely unsustainable level in supporting this patent illegality, and needs to be controlled and to cease immediately.
attributes.background:
To have an immediate public referendum on exiting the ECHR and deporting all illegal immigrants immediately, AND independently verifying AND acting upon the public referendum results forthwith.

You are, as Civil servants, answerable to the Citizens of this Country. Hold a Referendum now..
